snippet: Aleksei Navalny, a blogger and anticorruption crusader in Russia, arrived at work on Monday to find that his office had been bugged.
abstract: Aleksei Navalny, a blogger and anticorruption crusader in Russia, arrived at work on Monday to find that his office had been bugged.

headline.main: Kremlin Critic Debugs Office. Tweets About It.

keywords.name: subject
